titleStmt.title: The Golden bull: or, The fundamentall lavves and constitutions of the Empire Shewing, the persons and priuiledges of the princes electors, the manner of the election, the forme and ceremonies thereof, with other politique orders to be obserued by the states and subiects of the Empire, which shall bee assembed at Francford (for the election of the now next emperour) the tenth day of Iuly next ensuing. 1619.
Bulla Aurea. English
titleStmt.author: Holy Roman Empire.

titleStmt.title: The Golden bull: or, The fundamentall lavves and constitutions of the Empire Shewing, the persons and priuiledges of the princes electors, the manner of the election, the forme and ceremonies thereof, with other politique orders to be obserued by the states and subiects of the Empire, which shall bee assembed at Francford (for the election of the now next emperour) the tenth day of Iuly next ensuing. 1619.
Bulla Aurea. English
titleStmt.author: Holy Roman Empire.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Nathanaell Newbery, and are to be sold at the signe of the Star vnder S. Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: A translation of the Bulla Aurea of the Holy Roman Empire.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-G⁴ H² .
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
